Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Hold the ArrayList of ank accounts and method interacts with the bank accounts
    Since:
    1.8.0_144
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Minh Duc Pham
    See Also:
    Scanner

    • Method Detail

      • addAccount

        public boolean addAccount(char type,
                          int num,
                          java.lang.String fn,
                          java.lang.String ln,
                          long pn,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          double bal,
                          double minBal,
                          double interest,
                          double fee)
        Method to add the accounts into the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the account
        num - The account number
        fn - The account holder's first name
        ln - The account holder's last name
        pn - The account holder's phone number
        email - The account holder's email
        bal - The account balance
        minBal - The savings account's minimum balance
        interest - The savings account's interest rate
        fee - The chequing account's monthly fee
        Returns:
        true

        Returns:
